What are your business hours?: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
Where are you located?: We are located at 123 Business St., Business City, BC 12345.
How can I contact customer service?: You can contact customer service by emailing support@business.com or calling (123) 456-7890.
What is your return policy?: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase with a receipt.
Do you offer international shipping?: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries. Additional charges may apply.
